channel.title: Pages on Stephanie Hobson
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Stephanie Hobson

item.title: About
item.description: I was once compared to a striped carrot, a potion of beguiling, a saffron crayon and the Batmobile by a group of university friends while in Quebec City drinking some very cheep wine because it comes in bottles that make pretty beach glass. I got an education, a career, and a house but it turns out that doesn’t necessarily lead to happiness… so now I’m trying other things.
